NomaiObject: Hearthians 1 KEEK: I cannot give up yet.. 2 1 KEEK: Even with my limited supply of air, the members of Escape Pod 3 are counting on me to reach the Vessel and rescue them.. 3 2 KEEK: Oh, Plume.. Phlox.. Everyone... I pray that you are all safe... 4 3 KEEK: ... 5 4 KEEK: It feels like I have been drifting for ages.. 6 5 KEEK: What is this gruesome place? Have we been shrunken.. or are these spaces and its denizens truly so terrifyingly colossal? 7 6 KEEK: An update: I have drifted into what appears to be an enormous cluster of red orbs. Even a single one is a few times my size.. 8 7 KEEK: The orbs feel warm and gelatinous to the touch. They appear to be filled with.. liquid? 9 8 KEEK: ..These are anglerfish eggs. 10 9 KEEK: This.. This must be their nest. 11 10 KEEK: I must leave this area at once, before I am found and gravely punished for this trespass! 12 11 KEEK: No, no.. 13 12 KEEK: I have been surrounded! I, I'm sorry, my DBA R2 2 DBA EX1 9 DBA EX2 13 DBA EX3 8
